DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to determine the 90-day outcomes of mild and rapidly improving ischemic stroke.
DOC.brief_title: Mild and Rapidly Improving Stroke Study
DOC.criteria: Mild or spontaneously rapidly improving ischemic stroke confirmed by neuroimaging Arrival to hospital within 4.5 hours of symptom onset Willing to provide consent Available for a telephone interview at 30 and 90 days Onset >4.5 hours Unable to provide informed consent (patient or legally appointed representative Premorbid modified Rankin Scale >1 Unavailable by telephone for followup
